tp:docstring.p: The Compat interface holds properties necessary for maintaining the libmissioncontrol compatible layer.

A list of fields indicating the type of URI addressing scheme the the account can be used for (eg 'tel') indicating the account is suitable for use by apps offering a telephony UI, or 'sip' or 'xmpp' for those protocols
Associate (or disassociate) an account with a particular URI addressing scheme, (such as 'tel' for telephony)
URI scheme to associate/disassociate the account with/from
Whether to associate or disassociate with/from the URI scheme
